monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Monsters.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Blacksmithing
skills.description: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Monsters.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Carnage
skills.description: 2 x 165% (330%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies - Heal all allies for (500 + 150% Attack)

skills.name: Claws
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 130% (390%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 5
skills.description: 4 x 120% (480%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Critical Hybridization
skills.description: The first critical hit of a physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 60% of Magic value and vice versa.

skills.name: Debuff Resistance
skills.description: Debuff effects reduced by 50%

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Dragon Blood
skills.description: Aura: Dragons in the party regenerate 9% of their Max Health each turn and have +9% Mana Regeneration.

skills.name: Duality
skills.description: Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party gets Might, 50% chance it also gets Sorcery, and vice versa. (Does not trigger with itself)

skills.name: Empower
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party deal 5% more damage.

skills.name: Equipment Mastery
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.

skills.name: Forge
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (500 + 80% Attack) Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Forge Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (750 + 100% Attack) Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Heal Mastery
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) are increased by 20%.

skills.name: Health Focus
skills.description: Health values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Health Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Helping Hand
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (110 + 50% Magic) Applies Sidekick (Buff)

skills.name: Helping Hand Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (150 + 55% Magic) Applies Sidekick & Regeneration (Buffs)

skills.name: Heroic Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 2% for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Heroic Party
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party deals 1% increased damage for each Buff on it.

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Legion
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery & Barrier (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Life Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Focus
skills.description: Mana and Mana Regeneration values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Mana Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Might
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Miracle
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party Applies Glory (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Miracle Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party Applies Glory (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Miracle Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Sorcery & Glory (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Multi Might
skills.description: Aura: Might (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Sorcery
skills.description: Aura: Sorcery (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Neutral Affinity
skills.description: Neutral attacks deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Neutral Resistance
skills.description: Neutral damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Phalanx
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Phalanx Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Phalanx Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might & Barrier (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Physical Weakness
skills.description: Physical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 7.5% less damage.

skills.name: Shred
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Shred Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +60%

skills.name: Shred Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 135% (270%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +70%

skills.name: Sorcery
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Spectral Flame
skills.description: 3 x 70% (210%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 90% (270%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 80% (320%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 4
skills.description: 4 x 105% (420%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 105% (525%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Wave
skills.description: 1 x 180% magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Spectral Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 240% magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Spectral Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 145% (290%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Sustained Heal
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (500 + 30% Magic + 3% Max Health) Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party
